long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever sat in class, or at work, wondering: “aw man, I wish a super cool, awesome, developer had developed a chrome extension, for playing snake!” 
Well, you’re in luck, because I have! 
All you need to do, is to download the extension, and you’re golden. 
Now you’re ready to play snake in class, at work, or just at home, without being caught by your Boss, girlfriend or teacher.

Version 1.3 (Newest):
        -Bigger play area
        - Restart when dead
        - Personal Highscore system
        - better controls (with both wasd, and arrows)
